creator: anthonygerrard+apache.org@gmail.com
text:
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/appdev/deployment.html

"When you install an application into Tomcat (or any other 2.2/2.3-compatible server)"

shoud read something like

"When you install an application into Tomcat (or any other 2.2/2.3/3.0-compatible server)"

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.28 onwards.

It now says 2.2. or later at that point
